title: Development of Primary Healthcare
requirements: For students in Master of Public Health
description: This course provides an update on the structure, functions, strengths, and development of primary healthcare, which has been evolving over time.
outcome: Understand the definition, scope, and functions of primary healthcare in Hong Kong as compared to other primary healthcare systems in other countries. Appreciate a wide range of strategies to improve lifestyle habits of the general population. Contextualize stakeholders and tools used in primary healthcare. Comprehend common Public-Private Partnership (PPP) programmes in Hong Kong. Appreciate a wide range of strategies that may be employed to enhance quality of care and address current challenges in primary healthcare.
syllabus: Topic     Primary Healthcare revisited Tutorial       Lifestyle medicine Tutorial        Stakeholders and tools in primary healthcare Tutorial       Public-Private partnership (PPP) programmes       Quality improvement in primary care Tutorial       Emerging strategic direction Tutorial       Challenges of promoting primary healthcare Tutorial       Presentation of assigned topics
required_readings: To be advised by teachers in due course.
